Assessment Links
Important Information
Use the provided links above to practice and prepare for each assessment. When ready, the assessments can be found via the appropriate links on the bottom right. You will be given three hours to complete the assessement plus an additional ten minutes to read and understand the instructions. Your time will begin immediately after redirection to the assessment page. Do not click the link until you are ready to begin! When finished, return to this page and click the stop button.
